name: Ed Foran
title: Founder
bio: Ed founded the company that would eventually become Bluestream about 18 years ago when he came to Florida from NY. His early career life was fill with experiences in plumbing, gas, and heavy equipment work as an apprentice and eventually a foreman for some of the biggest plumbing companies in the Bronx and Queens. Suffice it to say, that he gained real life knowledge coupled with the toughness and work ethics that comes from working in NY and is using them to lead the extraordinary team that makes Bluestream. With over 30 years of experience under his belt, being a master of trades, Ed brings a wealth of knowledge that is second to none in the industry.
